input.sentences: as soon as we got to the hotel | i could n't wait to get to the beach .
luckily | the beach was in walking distance .
my boyfriend was excited to be on vacation with me .
we saw really cool trucks on the way to dinner that he really enjoyed .
i was glad we had a taxi | the traffic was terrible .
output.sentences: Mary could not wait to get to the hotel on the beach.
She was lucky to find one within walking distance to the ocean.
This vacation was more exciting because she got to go with her boyfriend, Chip.
The first day there, they enjoyed dinner that they bought off of a food truck.
Even though the place they visited lovely, they were glad they didn't live there because the traffic was awful and property taxes were through the roof.
